td.content: s:M electrician aged 44 Ys complains of Body Aches and other medical problems. NKDA. o:Height 170 cm, Weight 71.2 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 94, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16 a:Osteoarthritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

s:pt presents with Body Aches. he is having symptoms 16-17 times a week, in spite of treatment. pt is a white male electrician aged 44 years. o:Height 170 cm, Weight 70.7 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 94, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Osteoarthritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Hand Xray.

s:patient presents with 5 weeks history of Body Aches. he is a male aged 45 years. o:Height 170 cm, Weight 72.2 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 65, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17 a:Osteoarthritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed naproxen - 500 mg up to 3x day, and ordered Hand Xray.
